name: NSMB Mario Vs Luigi: KKT's Gooffy little Mod
summary:
A Mod Of The Somewhat Popular Mario VS Luigi Online!

This Mod Aims To Be Serious & Silly, With A Little Somthin' For Casual, & Competitive Players. Hazards, Which Are Random Objects That Randomly Spawn In The Maps.This Mod Features New Maps, Unused VS Maps From The Original Game, & More Unique Maps! New Characters Like Toad, & New Powerups Like The Bubble Flower & Bombro, & Several "Joke" Powerups. And Some Features To Customise Matches Further.

A bunch of other smaller features to find out yourself :)
